183701297.review: I remember discovering this game as a teen, like 20 years ago, and playing around Astrub - couldn't advance any further because subscription wasn't an option back then. It was one of my favorite games at the time, with its turn based combat, unique worldbuilding and a vibrant 2D graphics style. To my surprise, not only is the game still alive, but it recently got ported to Unity. I hope there's a chance it can return to Steam one day.
